English
Two-time Academy Award Winner Kevin Spacey gives the performance of a lifetime
in CASINO JACK, a riotous new film starring Spacey as a man hell bent on
acquiring all that the good life has to offer. He plays in the same game as the
highest of rollers and resorts to awe-inspiring levels of conning, scheming and
fraudulent antics to get what he wants. Inspired by true events that are too
over-the-top for even the wildest imaginations to conjure, CASINO JACK lays
bare the wild excesses and escapades of Jack Abramoff.
